name: A Thiefs Simple Way
description:
Break in, Evade Security, Steal Escape, Rinse and repeat. Wander inside the target building freely and in your own term. 

Want to disable all the camera on your way? Sure, Want to be a little risky and dance around with security, It's your funeral anyway. Create your own perfect simple heist.

  • Randomly generated entry and target item.
  • Simple top-down controls
  • Minimalistic Design
  • Easy controls and game mechanics
